sentences.english: The dominant idea was to be the glorification of horticulture and the exaltation of agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 其主題是對園藝的讚頌，以及對農藝感到興奮。

sentences.english: The improved pathway for specific technology study on agronomy has been put forward.
sentences.chinese: 據此，提出農藝學上的專用技術研究改進的途徑。

sentences.english: Michael said that about twenty agronomists Would come here in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾說，過幾天大約二十個農藝師要到這裏來。

sentences.english: Saturday, I asked a neighboring village management of citrus orchard of the agronomist .
sentences.chinese: 週六，我請教了鄰村管理桔園的農藝師。

sentences.english: The relevant departments shall proactively disseminate and promote the agronomic techniques of honeybee pollination.
sentences.chinese: 有關部門應當積極宣傳和推廣蜜蜂授粉農藝措施。

sentences.english: Some kinds of qualitative and agronomical traits are correlative.
sentences.chinese: 某些品質性狀與農藝性狀指標之間存在相關關係。

sentences.english: Now he heads the agronomy department.
sentences.chinese: 現在他擔任農藝系系主任。

sentences.english: Italian people are really proud of century-old prosciutto production.
sentences.chinese: 意小原非常他們的水腿農藝而高傲。

sentences.english: There are widely differences in agricultural properties between capsicum germplasms from different altitude.
sentences.chinese: 不同海拔高度辣椒品種資源農藝性狀存在着廣泛差異。

sentences.english: Tom was an agriculturist and working hard on agronomy.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是一個農學家並研究農藝學。

sentences.english: The issue of agricultural machinery serves the agronomy (or strictly meet the unchangeable agronomical requirements) or the contrary is a longstanding controversial one in China.
sentences.chinese: 關於農機與農藝誰爲誰服務的問題長期未解決。

sentences.english: Agronomy is the science of crop production.
sentences.chinese: 農藝學是一門與農作物生產相關的科學。

sentences.english: Some suggestions have been proposed for the application of resistant materials based on their agronomic characters.
sentences.chinese: 文中還結合抗源材料的農藝性狀對其利用提出了建議。

sentences.english: But young Walter Franklin was a modem agriculturist.
sentences.chinese: 可年輕的沃爾特是一個新型的農藝師。
